channel.title: Stuped Java 7 Problum and Path (pics)
channel.description:
Ok so i cant figure this out. and its starting to piss me off!
Ok so heres my java File
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/29xc1w0.jpg[/img]
Heres my EV's CLASSPATH [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/k12hpc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2hs4rad.jpg[/img] PATH [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2qxte2e.jpg[/img]
The error i get when i run the server [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2a6a7ix.jpg[/img]
If someone could help me i would realy thank you and would rep

item.title: Stuped Java 7 Problum and Path (pics)
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Well i change the run.bat and this Should work for most pi Servers and Clients im still working on the Compilers tho

Server:

@echo off title JcorscapeBeta java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause

Client:

@echo off Title Jcorscape Client cd ./bin/ START java -Xmx1000m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

Once i get the compiler to work i will fix it

Read full topic

item.title: Stuped Java 7 Problum and Path (pics)
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Try this for run @echo off
title Rehab United
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
(source wise)

and this one for compiling

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause

item.title: Stuped Java 7 Problum and Path (pics)
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

heres the edit codes for my Run and compiler
Server sided:

Run.bat

@echo off title InsidiaX "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Compiler:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

Client Sided:
Run.bat

@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

Compile

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
